mapper.sql: id, cost_detail_no, user_no, cost_type, goods_name, goods_price, quantity, unit, sub_total, pay_way, description, create_time, update_time, year, month, day, week
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO life_cost_detail ( cost_detail_no, user_no, cost_type, goods_name, goods_price, quantity, unit, sub_total, pay_way, description, create_time, update_time, year, month, day, week ) VALUES( #{costDetailNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quantity, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subTotal, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payWay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{year, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{day, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{week, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update LIFE_COST_DETAIL
cost_detail_no = #{costDetailNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_no = #{userNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost_type = #{costType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
quantity = #{quantity, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
unit = #{unit, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_total = #{subTotal, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_way = #{payWay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
year = #{year, jdbcType=INTEGER},
month = #{month, jdbcType=INTEGER},
day = #{day, jdbcType=INTEGER},
week = #{week, jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM life_cost_detail WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM life_cost_detail WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT FROM life_cost_detail WHERE cost_detail_no = #{costDetailNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
